results.title: Root account MFA enabled
results.recommendation: Enforce MFA for root and break-glass access.

results.title: IAM account password policy strength
results.recommendation: Require >=12 characters and enable symbols + numbers.

results.title: AdministratorAccess/PowerUserAccess attachments
results.recommendation: Replace broad managed policies with least-privilege roles.

results.title: Audit trail coverage (CloudTrail-like)
results.recommendation: Retain management events and alert on sensitive API calls.

results.title: Alerting baseline for high-risk events
results.recommendation: Expand detections (policy changes, public access attempts).

results.title: Security groups open to 0.0.0.0/0 on sensitive ports
results.recommendation: Remove internet exposure on admin/database ports; use VPN/bastion/SSM.

results.title: Egress restrictions on workloads
results.recommendation: Restrict egress and require approved endpoints where possible.

results.title: Public access guardrails for object storage
results.recommendation: Keep public access blocks enabled account-wide.

results.title: Encryption at rest for data stores
results.recommendation: Use KMS-backed encryption and rotate keys.

results.title: Backups and recovery posture
results.recommendation: Regularly test restores and document RPO/RTO.

results.title: Ownership + severity routing exists
results.recommendation: Define owners and on-call routing for critical findings.

results.title: Remediation workflow defined
results.recommendation: Track findings in tickets with SLA by severity.
